title: Do You Remember My Name? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Awkward Protagonist   Black Belly   Bullying   Clever Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Shy Characters   Siblings   Single Parent   Social Outcasts
author: Man Man He Qi Duo   漫漫何其多
description:
Hai Xiu has a slight social disorder. 

After he transfered school, his new teacher tried to help him to treat it slowly by giving him the task of sending and receiving homework and test paper from his fellow classmates. Although Hai Xiu has communication problem, he still stumbled around trying his best to do so. However, he accidentally misplaced the test paper of the school’s resident “bad student'

 And thus, started their sweet story together…>
